message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more as I'm starting the offer.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering I'm the one making the offer this round. Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  My turn to propose a 55/45 split.  We lose more money if this drags on!
Let's meet in the middle. 55/45 feels fair to me, considering the time we've wasted so far.  Agree and we both get more!
Okay Bob, let's stop wasting time. I'm coming down to 52/48.  It's a decent split, and we both lose if we wait any longer.
